title: S Rank on the same match I hit Mastery 5...
body: I just hit Level 5 Mastery on Lux, and on the same game where I leveled up I got an S Rank. In the post-game lobby I got two notices: One for hitting Mastery 5, and another saying I got a Mastery 6 token for my S Rank. But when I go to my Hextech tab, there's no Mastery 6 shard for Lux. Was this an oversight or something?

replies.body: It's necessary to start a match as level 5 in order to recieve level 6 tokens.  It's not possible to receive a token and level 5 at the same time, and the message you might have seen is an introduction to how tokens work.  We also have a [Champion Mastery ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide)guide that may provide some more details on how earning tokens work.  Please let me know if you have any questions!

The second message was to state that you can now earn Mastery 6 tokens. You have to hit Mastery 5 before you're eligible to earn Mastery 6 tokens, so all S ranks earned in games from now on will grant you tokens.
